data.lyric:
[ti:After A Few]
[ar:Travis Denning]
[al:After A Few]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]After A Few - Travis Denning
[00:04.94]Lyrics by：Travis Denning/Kelly Archer/Justin Weaver
[00:09.89]Composed by：Travis Denning/Kelly Archer/Justin Weaver
[00:14.84]Produced by：Jeremy Stover
[00:19.79]I probably shouldn't have said hello
[00:24.48]When I saw you out with your friends
[00:28.63]I know I should've left it alone
[00:33.20]When I caught you looking
[00:36.91]A little smile a little how you been
[00:39.17]A little touch a little reminisce
[00:41.46]It always starts off innocent
[00:44.49]But after a few drinks
[00:46.86]It's always the same thing
[00:49.07]We find ourselves lost in conversation at the bar
[00:53.34]Then after a few songs
[00:55.69]The kind that you hold on
[00:57.90]We find ourselves leaning up against my car
[01:02.29]Shoulda stopped at one
[01:04.15]Said goodbye given up at two
[01:06.10]If we didn't wanna wind up falling
[01:08.56]Into my bed like we always do
[01:13.75]After a few
[01:17.80]Oh after a few
[01:24.77]We always take it way too far
[01:29.15]Where it's too much to resist
[01:33.67]We always make it way too hard
[01:37.97]To walk away after that third kiss
[01:42.34]We pretend that we'll be fine
[01:44.22]Through the sting of the morning light
[01:46.46]'Cause it happens every time
[01:49.61]After a few drinks
[01:51.87]It's always the same thing
[01:53.99]We find ourselves lost in conversation at the bar
[01:58.23]Then after a few songs
[02:00.66]The kind that you hold on
[02:02.88]We find ourselves leaning up against my car
[02:07.29]Shoulda stopped at one
[02:09.08]Said goodbye given up at two
[02:11.12]If we didn't wanna wind up falling
[02:13.57]Into my bed like we always do
[02:18.87]After a few
[02:21.57]Oh yeah after a few
[02:29.27]Little smile little how you been
[02:31.29]Little touch little reminisce
[02:33.54]We both know how it ends
[02:36.85]After a few drinks
[02:39.11]It's always the same thing
[02:41.17]We find ourselves lost in conversation at the bar
[02:45.37]Then after a few songs
[02:47.74]The kind that you hold on
[02:49.96]We find ourselves leaning up against my car
[02:54.46]Shoulda stopped at one
[02:56.16]Said goodbye given up at two
[02:58.12]If we didn't wanna wind up falling
[03:00.61]Into my bed like we always do
[03:05.92]After a few
[03:09.96]Oh after a few
data.trans:
[ti:After A Few]
[ar:Travis Denning]
[al:After A Few]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.94]//
[00:09.89]//
[00:14.84]//
[00:19.79]也许我不该跟你打招呼
[00:24.48]当我看你和朋友一起外出
[00:28.63]我知道我该不予理会
[00:33.20]当我留意到你凝视着我
[00:36.91]莞尔一笑 寒暄问候
[00:39.17]些许感慨 缅怀过去
[00:41.46]一切总是不知不觉地开始
[00:44.49]可畅饮数杯酒之后
[00:46.86]总是重蹈覆辙
[00:49.07]我们在酒吧里相谈甚欢
[00:53.34]聆听几首
[00:55.69]正合你心意的动人乐曲之后
[00:57.90]忽然察觉我们倚靠在我的车里
[01:02.29]我们该在凌晨一点停止狂欢
[01:04.15]在凌晨两点道别 彻底死心
[01:06.10]如果我们不愿像往常一样
[01:08.56]尽情缠绵 同枕而眠
[01:13.75]几分钟过后
[01:17.80]几分钟过后
[01:24.77]我们总是忘乎所以 不顾一切
[01:29.15]难以抗拒彼此的吸引力
[01:33.67]亲吻三次后告别对方
[01:37.97]总是难上加难
[01:42.34]我们装作自己安然无恙
[01:44.22]可以熬过晨光带来的刺痛
[01:46.46]因为每次都是这样的结果
[01:49.61]可畅饮数杯酒之后
[01:51.87]总是重蹈覆辙
[01:53.99]我们在酒吧里相谈甚欢
[01:58.23]聆听几首
[02:00.66]正合你心意的动人乐曲之后
[02:02.88]忽然察觉我们倚靠在我的车里
[02:07.29]我们该在凌晨一点停止狂欢
[02:09.08]在凌晨两点道别 彻底死心
[02:11.12]如果我们不愿一如往常
[02:13.57]尽情缠绵 同枕而眠
[02:18.87]几分钟过后
[02:21.57]几分钟过后
[02:29.27]莞尔一笑 寒暄问候
[02:31.29]些许感慨 缅怀过去
[02:33.54]我们对结局了如指掌
[02:36.85]畅饮数杯酒之后
[02:39.11]总是重蹈覆辙
[02:41.17]我们在酒吧里相谈甚欢
[02:45.37]聆听几首
[02:47.74]正合你心意的动人乐曲之后
[02:49.96]忽然察觉我们倚靠在我的车里
[02:54.46]我们该在凌晨一点停止狂欢
[02:56.16]在凌晨两点道别 彻底死心
[02:58.12]如果我们不愿一如往常
[03:00.61]尽情缠绵 同枕而眠
[03:05.92]几分钟过后
[03:09.96]几分钟过后
